reviewText: Loved It. Great for relaxing to with beautiful music and imagery.

Loved the journey to the different cultural areas of Hangzhou.  Extremely interesting, and the traditional music was beautiful.  I particularly liked the village that had ''canals" running through it.  If I ever go to China, I would base my trip on this DVD.

I bought all this collection of cultural tour of Chinese cities with traditional Chinese music. I truely love them all. Photography and music are done professionally. These cds bring me back good memories. I visited these cities few years back. China is one of a kind, so is its music.

A Chinese Musical Journey: Hangzhou This is a finely made dvd, one which music lovers will admire. There are also many chinese instruments relatively unkown to westerners, with sounds and melodies alien to us. The music accompanies you as you tour through various parts of China. The price is also very good at $9.99. I highly recommend this dvd.
